page.title: 13Michelham Priory.
page.content: during the summer months,and hold various functions in the great barn, such as folk evenings music concerts etc.The house contains exhibits of furniture,tapestries,ancient stained glass and musical instruments.There are also many secret passages which were probably used to hide Catholics.There is also a legend that a grey lady haunts the Priory,riding around the grounds on horseback. Art exhibitions, craft weeks and many other functions are held in the Great Barn. There is also a shop in the grounds which sells country products as well as a working mill, and wheelrights shop. The Priory was also used as a location for a BBC drama production about the history of the theatre.
